The average of first ten prime numbers which are odd is?
Solution: Sum of first 10 prime no. which are odd = 158   :::  Average = 158/10 = 15.8

. Find the average of the first 20 natural numbers?
Solution: Average of the first 'n' natural numbers = (n + 1)/2   :::    We get (20 + 1)/2 = 10.5

Questions: The average of 13 numbers is 60. Average of the first 7 of them is 57 and that of the last 7 is 61. Find the 8th number?
A batsman makes a score of 64 runs in the 16th innings and thus increased his average by 3. Find his average after the 16th inning?
Solution: So, the average after the 15th inning will be (P-3) ::: Hence, 15(P-30) + 64 = 16P => P = 19.

Questions: The average marks of a class of 30 students is 40 and that of another class of 50 students is 60. Find the average marks of all the students?
Solution: Average marks of all the students = 4200/80 = 52.5

Questions: The average of 35 numbers is 25. If each number is multiplied by 5, find the new average?
The average of 10 numbers is 23. If each number is increased by 4, what will the new average be?
The average of the marks of 12 students in a class is 36. If the marks of each student are doubled, find the new average?
Solution: 12 students = 12 * 36 = 432  :::  The new sum = 432 * 2 = 864.::: So, the new average = 864/12 = 72.
